title: As a user I want to view a list of help topics in the system
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user wants to go to the help page
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on the HELP icon (?) and gets to help page
custom_expected:
THEN
- Help topics titles will be listed 
- they will be clickable links 
- Links should be in alphabetical order
- Clicking on a help topic will open the associated job aide in a new tab

title: As a user I want a submenu to close after clicking on an item within the submenu
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is viewing submenu for a left nav item (ex: Utilities, system dates, Major Contracts etc.)
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks on an item within the submenu

title: Submenus should "grow" up or down depending on what left nav item is the trigger
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is logged into the system
custom_steps: When the user triggers the submenus for left nav items (ex: Utilities, system dates, Major Contracts etc.)
custom_expected: THEN submenus should 'grow' up or down depending on what left nav item is the trigger

title: As a Club user I do not want to see items under "Utilities" that I do not have permission to view
custom_preconds: GIVEN the Club wants to view items under 'Utilities'
custom_steps: WHEN Club hover over Utilities tab on the left nav
custom_expected:
THEN 
-Clubs should not see "LRD" or "Batches" under the Utilities menus. 
-Only users that have the proper permissions should see these as options.

title: As a user I want to click on the help icon and be directed to a help page
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user wants to go to help page
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on the HELP icon (?) on top nav
custom_expected:
THEN
- User will be directed to the help page
- The help icon on the top nav should be active while on the help page
- Dashboard title = Help
- Form title = Ebis Help & Support

title: Enhancement - As a user I want to be able to search for Minor Contract Language
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has navigated to Advances Search
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects Minor Contracts for "Search For" field 
AND selects '"Language Phrase" from filters 
AND Select "In" operator (should be only this option)
custom_expected:
THEN 
- On the drop down "All Language" will be the default option. 
-The remaining options will be an alphabetized list of all of the clauses potentially contained within an MNC: 
Signing Bonus
Signing Bonus with Visa contingency
Dual Sport Language
Dual Sport with Visa Contingency
Contingency Bonus
College Scholarship
Incentive Bonus
Age and Identity fraud
Opening Day Roster Bonus
Remain on Roster Bonus
Foreign Team Inquiry Language
Release Clause
Minor League Miscellaneous
Spring Training Amount
Offset Salary Earned
Fixed Lump sum
Unearned Salary
Major League Base Salary
Minor League Assignment Salary
Performance Bonus
Award Bonus
MLR 9(c) Provision
Payroll Deduction Clause
Major League Spring Training Invite
Major League Miscellaneous
-Running the advanced search will return a list of the MN Contracts that meet any filters entered that contain the entered phrase in the selected language.

title: As a user I want to be taken to the existing preliminary contract if it exists
custom_preconds: GIVEN a player has an existing preliminary contract
custom_steps: WHEN user attempts to create a new preliminary contract for that player
custom_expected: THEN system will automatically navigate them to exiting preliminary contract and give a blue notification that says "Existing Preliminary Contract loaded" instead of the blocking message. Contract should be loaded in EDIT mode.

title: As a BOC admin I want to running the MJC Stat Batch to generate notifications
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is viewing the batch parameters widget on the MJC stat batch screen 
AND has selected 'update' from mode dropdown
custom_expected:
THEN
-A notification will be generated for any clause that is updated. 
-If a performance bonus is marked earned, Notification #2 will be generated for the BOC MJC Admin and the Club MJC Admin that the player is currently signed with. 
-If a salary escalator with a performance criteria is marked earned, Notification #4 will be generated for the BOC MJC Admin and the Club MJC Admin that the player is currently signed with. 
-If an Option with a performance criteria is marked earned, Notification #5 will be generated for the BOC MJC Admin and the Club MJC Admin that the player is currently signed with.

title: As a user I want to launch a new Minor Contract for an employee
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has permission to create MNC 
AND user is in Employee's profile
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks on 'Create New' 
AND select 'Contract' -> 'Minor Contract'
custom_expected:
THEN
-Selecting this option should load a MNC for the selected employee. 
-The MNC should be able to be created/submitted/approved just like any other MNC.

title: As a user I want to run the CBT Assessment Report
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is viewing the Report Listings widget
custom_steps:
WHEN user selects 'Competitive Balance Tax Assessment' report from the widget 
AND enters desired prompts
custom_expected: THEN the report will load with the entered prompts in separate tab.

title: As a user I want to run the CBT/ LRD Player Details Reports
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is viewing the Report Listings widget
custom_steps:
WHEN user selects 'Payrolls - Player Details' report from the listing widget 
AND selects "CB" or "LRD" from Payroll Type drop down
AND click OK
custom_expected:
THEN 
"C.B. Tax Payrolls - Player Details" or "LRD 40-Man Payrolls - Player Details" report will be launched depending on the selection. Entering the desired prompts and running the report will work and match the requirements.

title: As a user I want to run the CBT/ LRD Team Details Reports
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is viewing the Report Listings widget
custom_steps:
WHEN user selects 'Payrolls - Team Details' report from the listing widget 
AND selects "CB" or "LRD" from Payroll Type drop down
AND click OK
custom_expected:
THEN 
"C.B. Tax Payrolls - Team Details" or "LRD 40-Man Payrolls - Team Details" report will launch depending on what was selected. Entering the desired prompts and running the report will work and match the requirements.

title: As a user I want approving a contract to stamp the attached contract
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user created a MJ contract 
And attached the contract
custom_steps: When the Contract is moved to an Approved or Approved for next year state
custom_expected:
THEN
The system will add an approval stamp to the "Approvals" page of the attached contract. 
The system will need to determine what page of the uploaded pdf the Approvals page is on and stamp in the proper coordinates. 
The stamp will be same as EBIS1

title: Forgot password link on login page
custom_steps: Currently clicking this sends you to the login page of ebis 2.0 and the forgot password link on there doesn't seem to work either. We should decide what we want to do with this.

title: As a user I want to be able to indicate whether a Club is taking out additional insurance on a player
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is creating a MJ contract
AND user is in Insurance information selection of the contract
custom_steps: WHEN user checks off "Life/AD will be purchased outside of MLB's programs"
custom_expected:
THEN 
-An "Additional Insurance Amount" box to display where the Club will be required to enter an amount. (Required only if displayed)
-No maximum will be enforced on the filed and it should use the same dollar formatting that the rest of the contract uses. 
-The Printed Life Insurance form that prints as part of the Contract will reflect the addition of the amount by stating the amount that will be provided to the Club, and by reflecting the additional insurance amount in the "maximum" value that is printed on the form (currently it is always 37 million).

title: Add "Report a Bug" functionality to the user popover
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user wants to report a bug
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on "Report a Bug" in the user popover, where Logout is located
custom_expected:
THEN
-system will launch a new email window for the user to submit a ticket to ebissupport@mlb.com. 
-The email will contain a "Debug Info" at the bottom to display specs the system will populate when the email is sent.
-Contained will be the username, browser type and version, Monitor Resolution and the URL the user was on when they accessed the Report a Bug link. (sample from prod in comments)

title: As a user I want any attachment with a label of Contract to be stamped on approval
custom_steps:
Acceptance Criteria: 
* If valid contract PDF has been attached, clicking Update Status - > Approved will prompt the user to pick where to place the signature stamp. 
* "Default" will be the default selection on the pop up. 
* "Custom" will be the other option. Selecting "Custom" will display fields for the user to specify the page (counted back from the last page) and the x/y coordinates for the signature stamp. The fields will default to the default location as calculated by the system based on the current version of the saved contract. 
* "None" will be another option. Selecting "None" will not stamp the contract at all when "Approve" is clicked. 
* The buttons on the pop up will be "Approve" and "Cancel". 
* Clicking "Cancel" will close the popup and cancel the state change. 
* If "Custom" is selected, the "Approve" button will be disabled if any of the fields are left blank. Otherwise, clicking Approve will stamp the attached pdf with the signature stamp in the indicated location. 
* If "Default" is selected, the "Approve" button is always enabled and the system will stamp the attached pdf on Approve in the default location.
